original_title: Tere Ghar Me Ganga Behti Hai
overview: An orphan, Sarthak, is raised by a couple. As he grows up, Sarthak, along with two friends, raises awareness about serving parents across India and launches a massive campaign to celebrate February 14th as "Parents' Day." He meets with ministers, chief ministers, and officials to gain national recognition for this day.
title: Tere Ghar Me Ganga Behti Hai
